body_html: @vbod thanks, I commented out config.environment != run_config.Environment.LOCAL and, and that appears to work. I wonder why starting the server is prevented when using the Experiment class with a cluster definition locally.

body: @vbod thanks, I commented out `config.environment != run_config.Environment.LOCAL and`, and that appears to work.  I wonder why starting the server is prevented when using the Experiment class with a cluster definition locally.
